name: Switchels Limited dba Jukes Cordialities
slogan: High end, adult non-alcoholic cordials mixed with ice and still, sparkling or tonic water

jobs.title: Account Sales Executive
jobs.description:
About us: 
We are launching a pair of high-end non-alcoholic cordials in a new and rapidly growing sector. Jukes Cordialities is designed for people who want to maintain their high standards of taste when they are not indulging in alcohol. Our website is www.jukescordialities.com.
 
About the role: 
Working directly together with Founder and Head of Sales in product roll-out to top 200 London restaurants/clubs/wellness venues.
Develop & maintain contact with current and potential trade partners
Set up customer accounts and manage ordering 
Recording and processing sales orders
Advise customers on delivery schedules and after-sales service
Support marketing activities in the trade
 
Involves direct hands-on sales and marketing, venue staff training, account management, trade fairs and more.
Expect for business to internationalise over time, led by starting team.
 
Skills: 
2+ years of experience in sales
On-trade knowledge in Central London
Premium wine and/or drinks trade experience favourable
 
Requirements:
Energetic and highly motivated
Hands on and self-driven profile
BSc/BA in Business Administration or relevant field
 
Starting date: January 2020 targeted

Salary: Circa £30k

jobs.title: BUSINESS DEVELOPMENT MANAGER – HOTELS & B2B
jobs.description:
About us: 
We have recently launched a set of non-alcoholic cordials in a new and rapidly growing sector. Jukes Cordialities is designed for people who want to maintain their high standards of taste when they are not indulging in alcohol. These Cordialities show complex, aromatic characters as well as uncommon texture, flavour and richness on the palate. Our website is www.jukescordialities.com

The role involves: 
-	Managing the product roll-out to top London Hotels
-	Working directly together with Founder and Head of Sales to meet targets and align on sales & marketing strategies
-	Developing & maintaining contact with current and potential hotel trade partners
-	Setting up customer accounts
-	Supporting marketing activities in hotels

A second priority will be to develop the corporate channel in London (aiming the top law, accounting, bank and media firms).

This job involves direct hands-on sales and marketing, venue staff training, account management, trade fairs and more. 

Expect for business to internationalise over time, led by starting team.

Skills: 
•	2+ year of experience in sales
•	On-trade knowledge in Central London
•	High end wine and food sector experience is greatly appreciated

Requirements:
•	Energetic and highly motivated
•	Sales driven; is highly motivated by closing a deal
•	Entrepreneurial / self-starter mindset
•	Experience in the luxury sector
•	Business development skills - able to see new opportunities for the business
•	BSc/BA in Business Administration or relevant field

Salary: Circa £35k + performance

Starting date: ASAP
